snippet: Karim Benzema scored twice as Real Madrid thrashed Real Sociedad, 4-1, at home Saturday without the suspended Cristiano Ronaldo to ensure it remained atop the Spanish league.
abstract: Real Madrid defeats Real Sociedad, 4-1; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Karim Benzema scored twice as Real Madrid thrashed Real Sociedad, 4-1, at home Saturday without the suspended Cristiano Ronaldo to ensure it remained atop the Spanish league.

headline.main: Madrid Maintains First Place With Win
